elements.name: Kryptonite
elements.description: The weakness of Kryptonians, it seals their power and weakens their bodies.

elements.name: Kryptonians
elements.description: The people that live on this planet go by the title of Kryptonians, they live lives much longer than that of humans and have a much wider range of capabilities beyond that.

elements.name: Extinction Event
elements.description: This planet went through an extinction event that threatened the lives of all inhabitants.
